```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r, read}

library(readxl)
raw_data <- read_excel("Data/USFWS SAMB SNA_raw data.xlsx")

raw_data <- clean_names(raw_data)
```

# Cohort Network 

```{r, cohort}

cohort <- raw_data %>% dplyr::select(1:138) %>% dplyr::select(-c(x47,x93))

cohort <- cohort %>%  tidyr::pivot_longer(
    cols = c(adams_daniel:wilson_randy),
    names_to = "alter",
    values_to = "function"
    
) %>% select(name, alter, `function`, everything()) %>% 
  drop_na(`function`)


```
